name: VersusDemonsdemo
description:
Aiden got to know that a mage in Kelmora can teach her a spell which will help a lot in the fight against demons. Her village was getting constant attacks from monsters, so she started a journey to reach village Kelmora  to learn the spell.

This demo contains the first part of her journey when she reaches Oakwood village.

I will constantly improve its graphics. Just give your feedback if you encounter any bugs.

Tutorial

Just tap with two fingers at the same time to go back in android version.
